content.content:
1‚Üí#!/bin/bash
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üí# DevFlow Start Script v3.0.0 Production with Complete Orchestration
     4‚Üí# This script starts all DevFlow services for complete production system
     5‚Üí# INCLUDING: Multi-account monitoring, MCP delegation, cascade fallback
     6‚Üí# NO MOCKS - NO STUBS - NO PLACEHOLDERS - REAL IMPLEMENTATION ONLY
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üíset -e  # Exit on any error
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üí# Get the directory where this script is located
    11‚ÜíSCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
    12‚ÜíPROJECT_ROOT="$SCRIPT_DIR"
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí# Colors for output
    15‚ÜíRED='\033[0;31m'
    16‚ÜíGREEN='\033[0;32m'
    17‚ÜíYELLOW='\033[1;33m'
    18‚ÜíNC='\033[0m' # No Color
    19‚Üí
    20‚Üí# Function to print colored output
    21‚Üíprint_status() {
    22‚Üí  echo -e "${GREEN}[STATUS]${NC} $1"
    23‚Üí}
    24‚Üí
    25‚Üíprint_warning() {
    26‚Üí  echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"
    27‚Üí}
    28‚Üí
    29‚Üíprint_error() {
    30‚Üí  echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
    31‚Üí}
    32‚Üí
    33‚Üí# Function to check if a command exists
    34‚Üícommand_exists() {
    35‚Üí  command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1
    36‚Üí}
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí# Function to check if a process is running
    39‚Üíis_process_running() {
    40‚Üí  if [ -f "$1" ]; then
    41‚Üí    local pid=$(cat "$1")
    42‚Üí    # Special case for MCP servers that don't run as daemons
    43‚Üí    if [ "$pid" = "MCP_READY" ]; then
    44‚Üí      # Check if MCP server is still available by testing file exists
    45‚Üí      if [ "$1" = "$PROJECT_ROOT/.synthetic.pid" ] && [ -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/mcp-servers/synthetic/dist/dual-enhanced-index.js" ]; then
    46‚Üí        return 0
    47‚Üí      else
    48‚Üí        rm -f "$1"
    49‚Üí        return 1
    50‚Üí      fi
    51‚Üí    # Special case for limit detection system (not a real process)
    52‚Üí    elif [ "$pid" = "AVAILABLE" ]; then
    53‚Üí      # Check if required files exist
    54‚Üí      if [ -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/.claude/hooks/session-limit-detector.js" ] && [ -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/scripts/claude-code-with-limit-detection.sh" ]; then
    55‚Üí        return 0
    56‚Üí      else
    57‚Üí        rm -f "$1"
    58‚Üí        return 1
    59‚Üí      fi
    60‚Üí    elif kill -0 "$pid" 2>/dev/null; then
    61‚Üí      return 0
    62‚Üí    else
    63‚Üí      rm -f "$1"
    64‚Üí      return 1
    65‚Üí    fi
    66‚Üí  else
    67‚Üí    return 1
    68‚Üí  fi
    69‚Üí}
    70‚Üí
    71‚Üí# Function to cleanup Real Dream Team Orchestrator (auto-cleanup)
    72‚Üícleanup_real_dream_team_orchestrator() {
    73‚Üí  print_status "üßπ Auto-cleanup: Checking Real Dream Team Orchestrator..."
    74‚Üí
    75‚Üí  # Check if port 3200 is in use
    76‚Üí  if lsof -Pi :3200 -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    77‚Üí    print_warning "Port 3200 is occupied - stopping existing Real Dream Team Orchestrator"
    78‚Üí    local pid=$(lsof -Pi :3200 -sTCP:LISTEN -t)
    79‚Üí    if [ -n "$pid" ]; then
    80‚Üí      kill -TERM "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true
    81‚Üí      sleep 2
    82‚Üí      # Force kill if still running
    83‚Üí      if kill -0 "$pid" 2>/dev/null; then
    84‚Üí        kill -KILL "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true
    85‚Üí      fi
    86‚Üí      print_status "Stopped existing Real Dream Team Orchestrator (PID: $pid)"
    87‚Üí    fi
    88‚Üí  fi
    89‚Üí
    90‚Üí  # Kill any ts-node processes running real-dream-team
    91‚Üí  if pgrep -f "real-dream-team" > /dev/null; then
    92‚Üí    print_warning "Stopping existing Real Dream Team processes..."
    93‚Üí    pkill -f "real-dream-team" 2>/dev/null || true
    94‚Üí    sleep 1
    95‚Üí  fi
    96‚Üí
    97‚Üí  # Remove old PID file
    98‚Üí  rm -f "$PROJECT_ROOT/.real-dream-team-orchestrator.pid"
    99‚Üí}
   100‚Üí
